title: About me
intro: <0>Hi! I'm Mari, a Frontend Developer in the making,</0> currently studying at Folkuniversitetet in Gothenburg. During my first year, I gained experience across a wide range of topics and technologies.
more1: This year, I am continuing to build on that foundation by exploring cloud deployment with AWS, development of AI-powered web applications, and fullstack development with TypeScript. My skill set covers both frontend and backend, with a strong focus on clean code, user-friendly design, and agile collaboration. I enjoy creating applications that are not only functional but also accessible and visually engaging.
more2: I am looking for a LIA internship during weeks 2-10 and 15-24, 2026. If you have an available position or know someone I can get in touch with, I would love to hear from you! Send me an <0>email</0> or a message on <1>LinkedIn</1>.
